summary: Why I feel like Sirius being alive would have changed nothing in the last two books. First of all yes, Dumbledore would still...
body:
Why I feel like Sirius being alive would have changed nothing in the last two books.

First of all yes, Dumbledore would still have died because most of the sixth book is played in Hogwarts anyway, so Sirius would not be able to help. Same goes for the stuff Dumbledore and Harry do (with Slughorn and the cave). So the sixth book would just be the same. Harry might only have someone he could talk to.

Book seven would also not change so much, since Harry, Ron and Hermione disapperate during the wedding in chaos and Sirius might be left behind to fight with the others. So the tree would still search for the Horcruxes without anyone’s help. Until they come to the part in Malfoy Manor.

Sirius would only come back during the battle since I am sure the Order would try and keep them together as best they can. The only thing that would change is that Harry wouldn’t be so depressed.

summary: Honeslty i think the reason AVPM is 100 times better than C*rsed Ch*ld is because A) it never claimed to be canon and therefore...
body:
Honeslty i think the reason AVPM is 100 times better than C*rsed Ch*ld is because A) it never claimed to be canon and therefore it was 100% acceptable for them to do whatever the heck they wanted to and 2) IT ACTUALLY STICKS TO CANON MATERIAL like its an original story but all of the characters are fairly accurate to the books (unlike trying to claim that cedric would have turned bad and that snape would have been a good guy even if voldy won) and they know their Harry Potter lore so the worldbuilding is mostly consistant with canon (the time turner actually sticks to the same timeline, not creates a new one) PLUS as a bonus they actually explore some things that probably SHOULD have been addressed in canon like draco wanting to be harry’s friend

Tl;dr: AVPM is better than CC because the writers cared more about enjoying the source material then selling tickets to an “offical” hp show (plus there are songs)

summary: If the wand chooses the wizard is there a set price for all wands? Like, they should all be the same price right? Imagine a poor...
body: If the wand chooses the wizard is there a set price for all wands? Like, they should all be the same price right? Imagine a poor wizard going to get a new wand and the wand the picks him is the most expensive one in the store…that shit doesn’t seem right.

reblog.comment: If the wand chooses the wizard is there a set price for all wands? Like, they should all be the same price right? Imagine a poor wizard going to get a new wand and the wand the picks him is the most expensive one in the store…that shit doesn’t seem right.

title: Writers Appreciation Day
body:
I’m a day late but it’s never really too late to show some appreciation for writers!! Here’s a little list of a few of my favourites who if you haven’t already, you should definitely check out. And to each and every writer, thank you so much for putting so much time into your work and choosing to share it with everyone!! I only read Sirius Black x Reader at the moment and the stories these writers write for him are just wowowow, every update has me so excited so if you’re looking for a bit more Sirius in your life check these out!! 

@winterfellsdraco @snarledblack @wizardwritings @themarauderstheoutsidersandpeggy @sjriusblck @lupin-remus @lupinlongbottom @padfootink @theboywhocriedlupin @siriusoricns @pinkettepoet 

I’ve definitely missed a lot of people (I’m sick atm and my brain is not working 100%), so I’m so sorry for that but just know that I appreciate each and every single one of you, you’re all doing amazing and I couldn’t thank you enough for sharing your amazing stories with us!

title: In Memoria (Of Those Left Behind)
body:
by Rythes

A window into the life of Ginny Weasley after the Second Wizarding War. The Final Battle was won, but what did it cost Ginny? Can she ever feel the same as before?

Words: 1786, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: F/M
  • Characters: Ginny Weasley
  • Relationships: Harry Potter/Ginny Weasley
  • Additional Tags: Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder - PTSD, Post-Second War with Voldemort, The Burrow (Harry Potter), Weasley Family, AU

Read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2w3MC4V

summary:
Harry: I hated Umbridge so much!
Draco: I liked his classes
Harry: What? Why?
Draco: We, Slytherins, had a game in her classes....
body:
Harry: I hated Umbridge so much!
Draco: I liked his classes
Harry: What? Why?
Draco: We, Slytherins, had a game in her classes. It consisted in insulting her in a sutil way. She gave me 50 points for calling her a bitch
Harry: Draco Lucius Abraxas Cygnus Malfoy, would you marry me?
Draco: That's not my name, but okay

dialogue.name: Draco
dialogue.label: Draco:

dialogue.name: Harry

summary: Quote: “Not to worry,” she said. “All you have to do is walk straight at the barrier between platforms nine and ten. Don’t stop...
caption:
Quote: “Not to worry,” she said. “All you have to do is walk straight at the barrier between platforms nine and ten. Don’t stop and don’t be scared you’ll crash into it, that’s very important. Best do it as a bit of a run if you’re nervous. Go on, go now before Ron.” (Molly Weasley in Harry Potter and the Philosopher’s Stone)

Received in: World of Wizardry Geek Gear Pinz Subscription

blog.name: randomactsoffelton
blog.title: Feltbeats' Random Acts of Felton
blog.description:
“It's not how much we give, but how much love we put into giving.” - Mother Teresa
Random Acts of Felton Index & General Happy Birthday Messages

summary: Submit to wish Tom Felton a Happy Birthday! A few years ago Feltbeats.com worked with fans on one of the biggest birthday...
caption:
Submit to wish Tom Felton a Happy Birthday!

A few years ago Feltbeats.com worked with fans on one of the biggest birthday projects so far for Tom Felton – Random Acts of Felton! We received thousands of birthday wishes and hundreds of “Random Acts” geared toward spreading the true Felton spirit. Tom loved it! We decided it was so successful and well-received that we are going to do it again!

We had a break last year from RAOF for Tom’s big 30 by raising almost £2000 for the Great Ormond Street Hospital through the sale of a charity tshirt. But this year, Random Acts of Felton is back!

We believe Tom is someone who always brings light and cheer into the hearts of his fans and those around him. He is giving and kind to everyone he meets – and we feel like spreading that spirit as far as possible!

So, we’re asking fans to commit a Random Act in the Tom Felton spirit, and tell us all about it on our Tumblr! Then, we will present the website to Tom for his birthday.

What is a Random Act of Felton? 

Here are some amazing ideas for Random Acts that fans did last time we ran this project:

- A young girl raised over $200 dollars in Tom’s name, and donated it to charity (You rock Allison!).

 - A fan helped out at a senior center. 

- Fans spent time with kids with cancer, brightening up their day. 

- Fans baked cakes and food for others, helping to cheer them up. 

- On fan distributed Tom Felton / Feltbeats fliers at the mall. ….. And sooooo much more!

Instructions: To post your own Random Act of Felton, go to this blog and click on the menu. There will be an option to “Submit Your Random Act of Felton.” Click on that and submit your form! Easy! The deadline is Tom’s birthday; the 22nd of September.

If you just want to submit a birthday wish, photo or another item, feel free! All good things are welcome!

We believe Tom is someone who always brings light and cheer into the hearts of his fans and those around him. He is giving and kind to everyone he meets – and we feel like spreading that spirit as far as possible!

So, we’re asking fans to commit a Random Act in the Tom Felton spirit, and tell us all about it on our Tumblr! Then, we will present the website to Tom for his birthday.

What is a Random Act of Felton? 

Here are some amazing ideas for Random Acts that fans did last time we ran this project:

- A young girl raised over $200 dollars in Tom’s name, and donated it to charity (You rock Allison!).

 - A fan helped out at a senior center. 

- Fans spent time with kids with cancer, brightening up their day. 

- Fans baked cakes and food for others, helping to cheer them up. 

- On fan distributed Tom Felton / Feltbeats fliers at the mall. ….. And sooooo much more!

Instructions: To post your own Random Act of Felton, go to this blog and click on the menu. There will be an option to “Submit Your Random Act of Felton.” Click on that and submit your form! Easy! The deadline is Tom’s birthday; the 22nd of September.

If you just want to submit a birthday wish, photo or another item, feel free! All good things are welcome!
trail.content:
Submit to wish Tom Felton a Happy Birthday!

A few years ago Feltbeats.com worked with fans on one of the biggest birthday projects so far for Tom Felton – Random Acts of Felton! We received thousands of birthday wishes and hundreds of “Random Acts” geared toward spreading the true Felton spirit. Tom loved it! We decided it was so successful and well-received that we are going to do it again!

We had a break last year from RAOF for Tom’s big 30 by raising almost £2000 for the Great Ormond Street Hospital through the sale of a charity tshirt. But this year, Random Acts of Felton is back!

We believe Tom is someone who always brings light and cheer into the hearts of his fans and those around him. He is giving and kind to everyone he meets – and we feel like spreading that spirit as far as possible!

So, we’re asking fans to commit a Random Act in the Tom Felton spirit, and tell us all about it on our Tumblr! Then, we will present the website to Tom for his birthday.

What is a Random Act of Felton? 

Here are some amazing ideas for Random Acts that fans did last time we ran this project:

- A young girl raised over $200 dollars in Tom’s name, and donated it to charity (You rock Allison!).

 - A fan helped out at a senior center. 

- Fans spent time with kids with cancer, brightening up their day. 

- Fans baked cakes and food for others, helping to cheer them up. 

- On fan distributed Tom Felton / Feltbeats fliers at the mall. ….. And sooooo much more!

Instructions: To post your own Random Act of Felton, go to this blog and click on the menu. There will be an option to “Submit Your Random Act of Felton.” Click on that and submit your form! Easy! The deadline is Tom’s birthday; the 22nd of September.

If you just want to submit a birthday wish, photo or another item, feel free! All good things are welcome!
